result.reason: Feature request to extend encryption support to CSV/JSON exports; XML export already supports encryption but CSV and JSON do not.
result.approach: Extend the CSV and JSON serializers to support password-based encryption on export (matching existing XML encryption pattern). The FrmExport dialog already collects IsEncrypted/Password but only uses them for mRXML format — enable the encryption checkbox for all formats and wrap the serialized output with AES encryption when selected.

attempts.raw_output:
The code already supports encrypted XML export (`IsEncrypted` + `UseFullEncryption`). The feature request is mainly about extending encryption to CSV/JSON exports and adding cloud storage integration - a significant enhancement.
